Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects of altering road surfaces on reptile populations. This study was in Canada.

COMMUNITY RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
POPULATION RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
BEHAVIOUR (1 STUDY)

Use (1 study): One replicated study in Canada found that paved roads were not used more by Blandingâ€™s turtles than unpaved roads.
